name: Green Soldiers Heroes
overview: Become a Super Soldier and defeat the terrorists. The army has created a machine to regenerate the bodies of the best soldiers after a long and intense war. Due to the chemicals used, the soldiers' skin turns green. Many of them prefer not to return to society and live exclusively for military service. You are one of the green soldiers. Your mission is to defeat the terrorists who have taken over the desert region. Third-person shooter game. Ideal for beginner players. Earn coins to unlock more powerful weapons and new outfits. Adjustable aiming. Levels with increasing difficulty High definition 3D graphics Created by DERIK D.F Port by GRAMIK GAMES STUDIOS Third-party content is licensed.
